attributes.action: Lower the cost of all FA Football Coaching Courses in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
UEFA A COACHES IN:
Spain - 12,000
Germany - 5,500
England - 1,100

COST OF COURSES

FA LEVEL 1 - £150 1 week long
FA LEVEL 2 - £250 1 week long plus additional logbook work.
UEFA B LICENCE - £900-£1000
UEFA A LICENCE- £5,600

UEFA A LICENCE IN:
SPAIN - €1,200
GERMANY - €530

So how cheap is it to climb the ladder in those countries???
attributes.background:
People wanting to become a qualified football coach and a lot of grass roots clubs today in the whole of the UK simply can't afford the prices today wanted to climb the ladder required to become a coach.
Solution - Invest in people! Make it accessible and affordable for them. No coaches, no future!

rejection.details: The pricing of these courses is not set by the Government.
